channel.title: [CZAR] Object Right-Click Coloring [CZAR]
channel.description: When I right click an [b]object[/b], it's white instead of cyan. How can I change this?

item.title: [CZAR] Object Right-Click Coloring [CZAR]
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

I dont [quote=“rash, post:3, topic:377274”][quote author=zerogordo link=topic=473178.msg3460540#msg3460540 date=1294440663]
It should be defined somewhere in either the client or server I believe so just look for the color code that it is and remove it/ change it what you want to
[/quote]

Ya think?
I wouldve thought it would be in the cache.[/quote]

Can I ask why you’re trolling me instead of giving a better answer? I use what I know to help people so shouldn’t you do the same as this is a server help forum.

Read full topic
